message: I was thinking about making something about what's special in python & django, to whet your appetite, but I didn't make my mind whether to write articles, or videos. What do you think?

data.message: If you have time for only one, then I think  articles are better found, better read, and one can get into specific information in it more easily
Videos ya man, if you are up to it we can do it together

go ahead for pythonplease.com and djangoplease.com it can something like: http://html5please.com/ which you can add small description about each feature and we can make it part of our community projects :)
Video with slides like you are giving a course

i was thinking to make something like wiki in django...we all face problems and make alot of search to solve it can we write them together....or just write about common problems....it take me alot of time to add nodejs app to my django application ...or to customize django-mptt (recursive tree) with script and
